# Type Alias: Viewbox

> **Viewbox**: `object`

Geometry of a rectangular portion of the game that is projected on the screen.

## Type declaration

### height

> **height**: `number`

### mode?

> `optional` **mode**: [`FitMode`](/api/type-aliases/FitMode)

### width

> **width**: `number`

### x?

> `optional` **x**: `number`

### y?

> `optional` **y**: `number`
